detaileddescription.para: Returns whether this tool is affected by the given systematics

briefdescription.para: Returns the list of all systematics this tool can be affected by.
Returns the list of all systematics this tool recommends to use.

detaileddescription.para: effects: configure this tool for the given list of systematic variations. any requested systematics that are not affecting this tool will be silently ignored (unless they cause other errors). failures: systematic unknown failures: requesting multiple variations on the same systematic (e.g. up & down) failures: requesting an unsupported variation on an otherwise supported systematic (e.g. a 2 sigma variation and the tool only supports 1 sigma variations) failures: unsupported combination of supported systematic failures: other tool specific errors
